title: SR Suntour shows prototype electronic suspension on Tom Pidcock’s Gold Medal MTB
content:
Tom Pidcock’s Olympic winning XC race bike had a couple prototype parts on its mixed-brand build, but the most secretive was the electronically controlled SR Suntour fork and shock.
